parameters.name: hyperlinkSource
parameters.shortdesc: The hyperlinked object. Can accept: HyperlinkPageItemSource, HyperlinkTextSource or CrossReferenceSource.

parameters.name: hyperlinkDestination
parameters.shortdesc: The destination that the hyperlink points to. Can accept: Ordered array containing fileName:String, volumn:String, directoryId:Long Integer, dataLinkClassId:Long Integer, destinationUid:Long Integer, HyperlinkTextDestination, HyperlinkPageDestination, HyperlinkExternalPageDestination, HyperlinkURLDestination or ParagraphDestination.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Hyperlink

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Hyperlink.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlinks within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Hyperlink, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Hyperlink, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Hyperlink, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Hyperlink, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Hyperlink in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Hyperlink in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Hyperlink in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlink with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Hyperlink that follows the desired Hyperlink.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Hyperlink whose index follows the specified Hyperlink in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Hyperlink whose index comes before the desired Hyperlink.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Hyperlink in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Hyperlink in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Hyperlink.
Returns the Hyperlink with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
